description: Internal performance and workload metrics of Controllers

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "$retention"."pravega_controller_scope_created" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(previous)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "$retention"."pravega_controller_scope_create_failed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(previous)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "$retention"."pravega_controller_scope_deleted" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(previous)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "$retention"."pravega_controller_scope_delete_failed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(previous)

title: Pravega Controller Dashboard v0.7
